examples.example: 我想要通过自己的努力去实现梦想，让生活更加精彩。

translate.english: I want to realize my dream through my own efforts to make life more wonderful.

examples.example: 我想要在未来的日子里不断提升自己，遇见更好的自己。

translate.english: I want to continuously improve myself in the future days and meet a better self.

examples.example: 我想要用我的乐观积极去感染身边每一个人。

translate.english: I want to infect everyone around me with my optimism and positivity.
